title: Use File scoped namespaces in BuildCheck template
body:
### Context

https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/main/template_feed/content/Microsoft.CheckTemplate/Check1.cs should promote the new C# syntaxt and adopt the file scoped namespaces

(brought as a feedback by @timheuer)

nodes.body: File scoped namespaces is C#10 - while netstdandard 2.0 default lang is 7.3 - so closing as we do not want to enforce fixed or 'latest' lang version
